name: Tsion Tilahun
tagline: Graphics Designer, Social Media Manager & Content Creator
bio: I'm Tsion Tilahun, a graphics designer, social media manager, and content creator with over 8 years of experience crafting visuals and campaigns that connect with audiences. My work spans branding, print design, digital interfaces, content creation, and social media strategy. I believe design is more than aesthetics—it's about solving problems and creating meaningful connections.
shortBio: Designing bold visuals and content that connect. Specializing in branding, digital design, and social media strategy.

timeline.title: Started Design Journey
timeline.description: Began freelancing as a graphic designer while studying

timeline.title: First Major Brand Project
timeline.description: Designed complete brand identity for a tech startup

timeline.title: International Recognition
timeline.description: Won multiple design awards and expanded globally

timeline.title: Education Initiative
timeline.description: Started teaching design through online workshops

philosophy: Great design is invisible. It doesn't shout for attention—it simply works. My approach combines strategic thinking with creative execution, ensuring every pixel serves a purpose.
